content:
I'm afraid I'm still not able to pinpoint the exact tour or artists featured, as I don't have access to real-time information about the Modern Art Museum's tours or staff. Rachel may have led multiple tours, and without more specific details, it's difficult for me to identify the exact artists or works she discussed.

However, I can suggest a few options to help you learn more about the tour:

1. Contact the Modern Art Museum directly: Reach out to the museum's education department or visitor services and ask if they can provide more information about the tour led by Rachel. They may be able to provide you with a list of artworks or artists featured on the tour.
2. Check the museum's website: The Modern Art Museum may have a section on their website that lists upcoming or past tours, including descriptions of the tour content. You can check their website to see if they have any information about the tour you attended.
3. Reach out to Rachel directly: If you have a business card or contact information for Rachel, you can try reaching out to her directly and ask about the tour. She may be able to provide you with more information about the artists and works she discussed.

I hope these suggestions help! If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask.
